body:
It’s Debate Day. 
The first Republican presidential debate of the 2016 campaign starts at 9 p.m. EDT. We’ll be covering it live, minute-by-minute, beginning at 8 p.m. EDT, right here. 
David Lightman, McClatchy Washington bureau, contributed to this report.
description:
10 candidates, one big stage in Cleveland
Donald Trump leads the polls
Fox News/Facebook debate gets under way at 9 p.m. Eastern
…
Click to Continue »
title: Liveblog: The first Republican debate
